channel.title: Missions (new threads)
channel.description: Threads in the forum category "Missions" - Discuss various missions, discuss strategy, give advice, etc.

item.title: Jonin Ascension (S2+) Team Question
item.content:encoded: So, I've got Billy lv2 and Stalkergirl lv2, but I've got Pinky lv3. Part 9 requires I have the team Crazy Love Triangle, which is Billy lv2, Stalkergirl lv2, and Pinky lv2. Am I unable to complete this quest now?

item.title: Villages Ready to Explode?
item.description: Any villages ready to go through the Impossible Mission?
item.content:encoded: I've seent the perks of the villagers that went through the Impossible Mission and they are soooooo great. I kind of think that its an unfair advantage to the game but whatever. Anways, does anyone know of any villages that are ready to pop?

item.title: Shift Manager of DOOM
item.description: Help with Shift Manager of DOOM Quest
item.content:encoded: I'm stuck on the first part of the quest Shift Manager of DOOM. I can't pass the Tai test, I am Level 15 but only have 1 - 11 Range so I fail. What should I do? It's a BurgerNinja quest, so no allies, or jutsu. I already have Chakra Armor

item.title: Quest: Peeping
item.content:encoded: It says to "drill a hole and peep! This is a Rolling Challenge!", which jutsu do I need to use for this qeust. Im sure its one of Lil' Bo's jutsu's but I don't know which one.

item.title: Any1 doing The Impossible Mission?
item.content:encoded: just wondering if any1 is doing it i would love to join ur village for the perm just leave village name if ur doing it or plan to soon

item.title: Reaper Quest "Over the Edge"
item.content:encoded: Now I know it says that I have to wait 72 hours before continuing the quest, but does it have to be exactly 72 hours? Or does it just have to be at least 72 hours?

item.title: St Flash Day. (Quest)
item.content:encoded:
What does it mean to "hang out with Bruce Jr"
I have him in a 1 man team, what more does it want T_T

item.title: Sannin vs 2 B A Master
item.content:encoded: I did a successful Sannin run today and have over 1.5 mil ranking xp but I still can't complete 2 B A Master - is it because I'm still not one of the top 3? How much more should I get to do so?? Thanks - I'm confused by the difference between the two ><

item.title: Storybook Pages?
item.content:encoded: So, I have proof reader, but I can't get him to drop any storybook pages. I've set my theme and sponsored item to up the ally drop chance, teamed with HoClaus and Olmek, and taken 12 Chasers from the Juice Bar. And after four days of doing nothing but missions with him, I haven't gotten a single storybook page. Which makes me think I'm missing something, here. Any advice?

item.title: bloodlines
item.description: what blodd line is easy to get
item.content:encoded: I'm season 2 right now and a special jonin in order to become a jonin for season 2+ you need 3 bloodlines. so far i have 2 reaper and legacy, but i can't get a third. i tried to get greass and waste land, but i was getting no where with greass. On the first part of the wasteland quest i'm always on success short. What bloodline is the easiest to get. I've been training for a while, and 5 more levels and i'll be ready for sanin. So what should i do and which bloodling is easiest to get.

item.title: A - level missions
item.content:encoded:
A-level missions seem quite toughâ€¦any1 can recommend most appropriate level to start doing them with good mission success? The range needed seems to be quite high. I guess the most appropriate team would be 'Ro-Sham-Bo Redux!' ?

thx for helping with this Noob qns :)

item.title: 30 bingos in a day
item.content:encoded:
Hi, I'm planning to get 30 bingos in one day trophy on monday (stamina boost).
Actually - 30 bingos is enough to bingo half the village (depends on the lvl of the members and upgrades of the village) - and thus let someone obtain Ninpo Mask. If you would like me to get you Ninpo Mask post it here.

We can establish the details later on in this thread.

item.title: Arena help
item.description: Probably would have made a shadow reference, but unsure ont eh cursing policy ^^
item.content:encoded: I'm S2 Jonin, with a fair amount of permanents. I need doughman (and also seriously after the warrior ofâ€¦ whiteeye l33tness.) for monochrome, does anyone have advice for the arena? I can never seem to win enough fights to get close to the 15, and can never win enough dark hour fights to keep my moon above new moon waning. Apart from using emergency rations (Takes kinda long to farm themâ€¦) what advice does anyone have?

item.title: Uber r00t haxing
item.content:encoded:
Do permanents like the mark of 11DB affect drain? (ones that boost ALL stats)
Does recompiling affect drain as well?
Just curious.
Also, what perms/effects boost edge?

item.title: A Golden Story
item.content:encoded:
Is it possible to do A Golden Story more than once per season? I haven't heard anything about it, I've just been wondering, cause if it is possible it might be a good idea to get alot of Storybook Pages from the Marketplace in earlier missionsâ€¦

Does anyone know whether it works or not? Thanks in advance :)

item.content:encoded: I'm having trouble hitting the daily xp requirements for one part of the Ascension quest is there a better way to get xp ranking than spamming missions? Because I can't quite seem to get the amount I need.
